basics.name: Ali Kyrouz
basics.summary: I am interested in combining my Data Science and English majors to explore data visualization applications and analysis of literary texts, particularly involving computational and statistical analysis and natural language processing.

work.summary: Transcribed and uploaded historical documents, communicated with professors and department head
Coordinated restaurant orders, kept front and counter stocked, managed drink orders and POS
Acted as viola section leader, planned activities for and organized younger orchestra members, prepared and carried first aid kit

Greeted customers and facilitated transactions, shared information with large groups of people in a fun and interesting way, maintained order and rule-following in excitable environment, helped to create immersive experience for players
